title: Meeting with Product Team
content: We need to discuss the upcoming product roadmap and feature priorities for Q3. Please bring your team's sprint plan.

title: Project Alpha Status Update
content: Critical issues have been identified in the latest deployment. Engineering team is working on a fix. ETA for resolution is 4 hours.

title: Reminder: Submit Expense Reports
content: This is a friendly reminder to submit any outstanding expense reports by the end of this week. Late submissions may be processed in the next payment cycle.

title: Quarterly Review Scheduled
content: Your quarterly performance review has been scheduled for next Monday at 2pm. Please complete your self-assessment before the meeting.

title: Office Building Maintenance
content: The east wing of the building will undergo maintenance this weekend. Please ensure you don't leave any valuables at your desk.

title: Office Party Next Friday
content: Join us for our summer office party next Friday at 4pm. Food and refreshments will be provided. Please RSVP by Wednesday.

title: New Training Courses Available
content: Several new courses have been added to our learning platform. Check out new modules on React, TypeScript, and Swift development.

title: Welcome to the New Team Members
content: Please join me in welcoming Sarah and Michael to our development team. They'll be starting next Monday.
